name: Make Your Kingdom
description:
Make Your Kingdom - voxel town building game, where you need to lead your settlement and keep look at needs of them. Every one of them is a character! Depending on their mood and happy they will help develop the city or destroy it.



You need to manage infrastructure of the settlement, build a specific buildings to production of specific resources and correctly allocate manpower for them, deal with the problems of residents, and, make the city more favorable for the future.

Everything happens in the world where all lives by own laws. From time to time nature will test you and your people on the strength. You should to searched for condition of buildings, fire safety and other key indicators of the settlement.

You can to get outside and see, how your people live, what they think about life in the city, you can to help them with the extraction of resources and production, help in the construction or repair of buildings.

Build best place and home for your people and for the future.
Build your best kingdom.
